charges.charge_description: 21 U.S.C. Sections 846 &; 841(a)(1) - Conspiracy to possess with intent to distribute a mixture or substance containing heroin, a schedule I controlled substance
21:846 Conspiracy to Possess with intent to Distribute and to Distribute Heroin(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant is committed to the custody of the Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a term of 120 months. Upon release from imprisonment, the Defendant shall be placed on supervised release for a term of 5 years, with standard/special conditions. $100 Special Assessment. Fine is waived. Recommendations to BOP: Defendant shall be housed at FCI Elkton; Defendant shall participate in the Intensive Drug Treatment Program; Defendant shall participate in the Inmate Financial Responsibility Program at a rate of at least 10% of his gross monthly income; Recommendation for Second Chance Program; Defendant shall be given credit for time served in this case. Defendant shall forfeit as set forth in the final order of forfeiture. Defendant advised of his appeal rights.

charges.charge_description: 21 U.S.C. Sections 846 and 841(a)(1) - Conspiracy to possess with intent to distribute a mixture or substance containing heroin, a schedule I controlled substance
21:846 Conspiracy to Possess with intent to Distribute and to Distribute Heroin(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant is committed to the custody of the Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned to a mandatory minimum sentence of 60 months. Upon release from imprisonment, Defendant shall be placed on supervised release for a term of 5 years, with standard/special conditions. $100 special assessment. Fine is waived. Defendant shall be given credit for time served since 3/6/2013. Defendant advised of his right to appeal.
